00019 /*! \file
00020  * \brief General Asterisk channel transcoding definitions.
00021  */
00022 
00023 #ifndef _ASTERISK_TRANSCAP_H
00024 #define _ASTERISK_TRANSCAP_H
00025 
00026 /* These definitions are taken directly out of libpri.h and used here.
00027  * DO NOT change them as it will cause unexpected behavior in channels
00028  * that utilize these fields.
00029  */
00030 
00031 /*! \name AstTranscode General Asterisk channel transcoding definitions.
00032 */
00033 /*@{ */
00034 #define AST_TRANS_CAP_SPEECH           0x0
00035 #define AST_TRANS_CAP_DIGITAL          0x08
00036 #define AST_TRANS_CAP_RESTRICTED_DIGITAL     0x09
00037 #define AST_TRANS_CAP_3_1K_AUDIO       0x10
00038 #define AST_TRANS_CAP_7K_AUDIO            0x11  /* Depriciated ITU Q.931 (05/1998)*/
00039 #define AST_TRANS_CAP_DIGITAL_W_TONES        0x11
00040 #define AST_TRANS_CAP_VIDEO            0x18
00041 /*@} */
00042 
00043 #define IS_DIGITAL(cap)\
00044    (cap) & AST_TRANS_CAP_DIGITAL ? 1 : 0
00045 
00046 #endif /* _ASTERISK_TRANSCAP_H */
